response.overview: “HAVEN”, is an experimental film that delves into the visualization of human emotions, focusing on the journey from anxiety to self-reconciliation. It portrays the protagonist’s escape from Plato’s allegorical cave into a three-tiered structure within a fallen angel, symbolizing the blend of mind and body, and concludes in a tranquil forest symbolizing inner peace. Drawing from Carl Jung’s concept of collective consciousness and Nietzsche’s theories on Greek tragedy, “HAVEN” explores themes of destruction as a precursor to rebirth. By weaving these philosophical elements with real-life metaphors from expert interviews, the film offers viewers a space for solace and reflective contemplation on the universal patterns that underpin our emotional experiences.
response.title: Haven
